TopicTitle: A Son's Lament: Chapters 10 and 11: The movie! :D

Articles.Content:
As only a handful of you know, unfortunately, I have been deeply dedicated in writing a massive fanfiction story in the KSP universe, inspired by some of my favorite sci-fi games, called "A Son's Lament." I've also made a movie alongside the fanfiction covering 2 of the chapters.

Well, here's the flick, I hope you enjoy, it has pretty music. I would suggest reading first. ;D
Wow, very nice. I like the style of video. You must've spent ages editing this and fiddling with the audio!
Indeed, even more so writing the story around it.
